properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE DISPLAY_STATUS = 'Y' AND DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, N.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') "CREATE_DATE" , COUNT FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE DISPLAY_STATUS = 'Y' AND DELETE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) N ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
